com.example.zhaorui.dvdcollector.Controller

Class InventoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.zhaorui.dvdcollector.Controller.InventoryController

  • public class InventoryController
extends java.lang.Object

    The InventoryController is a controller of Inventory, which controls inventory information.

    See Also:
    ArrayList

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InventoryController()
      Get the user's inventories and restore them.
